DomainData.MainInfoText: We use cookies to enhance and personalise your experience.
DomainData.AlertNoticeText: We and our partners use cookies to enhance and personalise your experience. “Allow all cookies,” “Accept only essential cookies,” or select "Manage cookies" to choose which types of cookies are used. You can learn more about cookies at kuxila or adjust your cookie preferences anytime through the Privacy Policy. More information
DomainData.BannerTitle: We use cookies to deliver kuxila's services
DomainData.CookieListDescription: A cookie is a small piece of data (text file) that a website – when visited by a user – asks your browser to store on your device in order to remember information about you, such as your language preference or login information. Those cookies are set by us and called first-party cookies. We also use third-party cookies – which are cookies from a domain different than the domain of the website you are visiting – for our advertising and marketing efforts. More specifically, we use cookies and other tracking technologies for the following purposes:

Groups.GroupDescription: Functional cookies enable us to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation, for example, by remembering that you prefer vegetarian food when conducting searches for restaurants.
Groups.GroupDescriptionOTT: Functional cookies enable us to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation, for example, by remembering that you prefer vegetarian food when conducting searches for restaurants.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: mmp
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to indicate whether or not the user has expanded the map displaying business locations on the search results page.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: api_ct
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used during guest checkout to facilitate account claiming after an order is placed.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: bui
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to personalize content users on the kuxila for Business site view on Wordpress.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: rsp
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to save kuxila Reservation search parameters.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _omappvs
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is used to determine if the visitor has visited the website before, or if it is a new visitor and to provide functions across pages.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ds
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to avoid replication delay and, for example, to allow a business to see users reviews immediately.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: mspc
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to indicate whether a message sender has successfully completed a captcha test.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: qtt
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used for users being redirected from CITYVOX website.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: vc
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to keep track of user sessions.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: location
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie stores the location a user has most recently searched in and is used to populate the "find near" box across the site.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: pid
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie lets website visitors use Twitter-related features from within the web page they are visiting.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: recentlocations
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to maintain locations of a user's recent searches.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: acs
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to confirm a user's email address during sign up.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ap
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to manage users' preferences regarding whether to view the mobile app download prompt.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: expr
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used by kuxila for overriding experiment assignments as it works to improve the functionality of the site.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: mp
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie stores a user's preference for whether they wish to visit kuxila's mobile versus desktop site.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: w_id
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to keep track of waitlist visits by logged out users.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: bsca
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to save user preferences for viewing certain advertisements.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: hl
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to determine which language to send users who make requests to a multilingual top-level domain without specifying a subdomain.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: rpoi
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to direct business owners to the part of the site they need to visit after making a purchase.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: as
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to keep track of user sessions.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: hsfd
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used determine what tab a logged-in user is currently on while navigating tabs on kuxila's homepage.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: rktt
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used for users being redirected from CITYVOX website.

Cookies.description: This domain is owned by Facebook. The main business activity is: Social Media
Cookies.thirdPartyDescription: This domain is owned by Facebook. The main business activity is: Social Media

Cookies.thirdPartyDescription: This is a CloudFoundry cookie

Cookies.Name: X-Salesforce-CHAT
Cookies.description: Sales Force uses these cookies to be able to provide live chat functionality to the user.

Cookies.Name: sp_landing
Cookies.description: This domain is owned by Spotify, a USA based music streaming service.  Spotify provides a number of tools to embed into websites, which enable the tracking of users and non-users across domains.

Groups.GroupDescription: Analytics cookies allow us to understand how visitors use our site and measure and optimize the site's performance.
Groups.GroupDescriptionOTT: Analytics cookies allow us to understand how visitors use our site and measure and optimize the site's performance.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wv
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to associate mobile site sessions with mobile app sessions in webview interactions.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _gat_xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
FirstPartyCookies.description: Google Analytics Cookies
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: Google Analytics Cookies

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _hjTLDTest
FirstPartyCookies.description: When the Hotjar script executes we try to determine the most generic cookie path we should use, instead of the page hostname. This is done so that cookies can be shared across subdomains (where applicable). To determine this, we try to store the _hjTLDTest cookie for different URL substring alternatives until it fails. After this check, the cookie is removed.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _ga_xxxxxxxxxx
FirstPartyCookies.description: Used by Google Analytics to identify and track an individual session with your device.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: Used by Google Analytics to identify and track an individual session with your device.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _gac_UA-30501-101
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to distinguish unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: This cookie is used to distinguish unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _gid
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is associated with Google Universal Analytics. This appears to be a new cookie and as of Spring 2017 no information is available from Google.  It appears to store and update a unique value for each page visited._gid
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: _gid

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _omappvp
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is used to determine if the visitor has visited the website before, or if it is a new visitor on the website.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _gac_UA-30501-100
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to distinguish unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: rollup_ga
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to distinguish unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: This cookie is used to distinguish unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _uetvid
FirstPartyCookies.description: This is a cookie utilised by Microsoft Bing Ads and is a tracking cookie. It allows us to engage with a user that has previously visited our website.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _hjSessionUser_xxxxxx
FirstPartyCookies.description: Hotjar cookie that is set when a user first lands on a page with the Hotjar script. It is used to persist the Hotjar User ID, unique to that site on the browser. This ensures that behavior in subsequent visits to the same site will be attributed to the same user ID.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: Hotjar cookie that is set when a user first lands on a page with the Hotjar script. It is used to persist the Hotjar User ID, unique to that site on the browser. This ensures that behavior in subsequent visits to the same site will be attributed to the same user ID.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _hjSession_xxxxxx
FirstPartyCookies.description: A cookie that holds the current session data. This ensues that subsequent requests within the session window will be attributed to the same Hotjar session.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: A cookie that holds the current session data. This ensues that subsequent requests within the session window will be attributed to the same Hotjar session.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: pid
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie gathers analytics on how users move around the kuxila site.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _ga
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is associated with Google Universal Analytics - which is a significant update to Google's more commonly used analytics service. This cookie is used to distinguish unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier. It is included in each page request in a site and used to calculate visitor, session and campaign data for the sites analytics reports.  By default it is set to expire after 2 years, although this is customisable by website owners.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: This cookie is used to distinguish unique users by assigning a randomly generated number as a client identifier.

Cookies.Name: pid
Cookies.description: This cookie gathers analytics on how users move around the kuxila site.

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies are necessary for the website to function. They are usually only set in response to requests made by you, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in, or filling in forms.
Groups.GroupDescriptionOTT: These cookies are necessary for the website to function. They are usually only set in response to requests made by you, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in, or filling in forms.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: xcj
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to identify and restrict bot traffic and scraping.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: uuac
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to identify and limit potentially malicious bot requests from certain IP addresses.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: bspc
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to allow users on the kuxila for Business site to redeem promotion codes.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: strack
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie monitors a user's progress through the signup flow when creating a kuxila account.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: used_locale_selector
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to determine where a user is attempting to navigate within the kuxila site to ensure the site works properly.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wordpressuser_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used by WordPress to store user authentication details. It is part of the WordPress user session management and is used to maintain the user session on the website.WordPress login authentication cookie
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: WordPress login authentication cookie

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wp-settings-
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used by WordPress to customize the user's view of the admin interface, and possibly also the main site interface.WordPress also sets a few wp-settings-{time}-[UID] cookies. The number on the end is your individual user ID from the users database table. This is used to customize your view of admin interface, and possibly also the main site interface.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: WordPress also sets a few wp-settings-{time}-[UID] cookies. The number on the end is your individual user ID from the users database table. This is used to customize your view of admin interface, and possibly also the main site interface.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: hl
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is associated with Houlihan Lokey which is used to help prevent Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks, preserve the visitor's session state across page requests, distribute traffic to the website on several servers to optimise response times, store the user's cookie consent state for the current domain, ensure website security and fraud detection, preserve users states across page requests, track the visitor's use of video-content, collect information on user behaviour on multiple websites to optimize the relevance of advertisement, and used in context with Account-Based-Marketing (ABM) to register data such as IP-addresses, time spent on the website and page requests for the visit.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: ppn
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to show users updates to kuxila's Privacy Policy.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wordpress_test_cookie
FirstPartyCookies.description: Used on sites built with Wordpress.  Tests whether or not the browser has cookies enabledOn login, WordPress uses the wordpress_[hash] cookie to store your authentication details. Its use is limited to the Administration Screen area, /wp-admin/
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: On login, WordPress uses the wordpress_[hash] cookie to store your authentication details. Its use is limited to the Administration Screen area, /wp-admin/

FirstPartyCookies.Name: biz_owner
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used for providing authorization information for users on the kuxila for Business site.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: XSRF-TOKEN
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is written to help with site security in preventing Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.This cookie helps with site security in preventing Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: This cookie helps with site security in preventing Cross-Site Request Forgery attacks.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wordpress_sec_
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used by WordPress to provide protection against hackers, store account details for logged in users and for logged in user authentication.WP Admin logged in cookie which is created dynamically.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: WP Admin logged in cookie which is created dynamically.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: pr
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to permit users on the kuxila for Business site to redeem promotion codes.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: datadome
FirstPartyCookies.description: DataDome is a bot protection service that may use cookies to distinguish between legitimate users and bots. It is used to protect websites from scraping, fraud, and other types of automated abuse.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: bse
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to personalize content users on the kuxila for Business site view on Wordpress.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: gpc
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to enable guest users on the mobile sites to claim their kuxila account and save order details.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wdi
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie allows kuxila to identify potentially malicious bots on its platforms and enabling it to take action on them.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wordpress_logged_in_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used by WordPress to indicate when a user is logged in, and who the user is, for most interface use.On login, WordPress uses the wordpress_[hash] cookie to store your authentication details. Its use is limited to the Administration Screen area, /wp-admin/
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: On login, WordPress uses the wordpress_[hash] cookie to store your authentication details. Its use is limited to the Administration Screen area, /wp-admin/

FirstPartyCookies.Name: cim
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to ensure that users in the EU are shown the required notices regarding kuxila's usage of cookies as required by the GDPR.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: biz_session
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to authenticate users on the kuxila for Business site.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: PHPSESSID
FirstPartyCookies.description: PHP session cookie associated with embedded content from this domain.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: sut
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to support "magic link" logins, whereby a user can log into their account simply by clicking on the link provided.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wp-settings-time-X
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used by WordPress to customize the view of admin interface and possibly also the main site interface, based on user settings.WordPress also sets a few wp-settings-{time}-[UID] cookies. The number on the end is your individual user ID from the users database table. This is used to customize your view of admin interface, and possibly also the main site interface.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: WordPress also sets a few wp-settings-{time}-[UID] cookies. The number on the end is your individual user ID from the users database table. This is used to customize your view of admin interface, and possibly also the main site interface.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wordpress_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX

Its use is limited to the Administration Screen area, /wp-admin/

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wp-postpass_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to grant access to password protected areas of a WordPress site, if the user has entered the correct access password.Used to maintain session in WordPress if a post is password protected
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: Used to maintain session in WordPress if a post is password protected

FirstPartyCookies.Name: flash
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to display error and other messages when a user is returned to forms.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: saut
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to ensure compliance with kuxila's age gate.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: guvo
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to ensure that a users' experience is consistent across the mobile apps and kuxila website.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: dm
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to indicate which messages and notices a user has dismissed.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: wordpresspass_XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is used to maintain user's login status as they navigate across multiple pages on the website.WordPress login authentication cookie
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: WordPress login authentication cookie

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _ScCbts
FirstPartyCookies.description: TS
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: TS

FirstPartyCookies.Name: zss
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used to authenticate and maintain user sessions.

Cookies.Name: OptanonConsent
Cookies.description: This cookie is set by the cookie compliance solution from OneTrust. It stores information about the categories of cookies the site uses and whether visitors have given or withdrawn consent for the use of each category. This enables site owners to prevent cookies in each category from being set in the users browser, when consent is not given. The cookie has a normal lifespan of one year, so that returning visitors to the site will have their preferences remembered. It contains no information that can identify the site visitor.

Groups.GroupDescription: Functional cookies allow the website to function and enable us to provide enhanced features and personalisation. Analytics cookies allow us to understand how visitors use our site and to measure and optimize the site.
Groups.GroupDescriptionOTT: Functional cookies allow the website to function and enable us to provide enhanced features and personalisation. Analytics cookies allow us to understand how visitors use our site and to measure and optimize the site.

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies are intended to make advertising more relevant to users and more valuable to advertisers. For example, we may use Cookies to serve you interest-based ads. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising, but you will still see ads.
Groups.GroupDescriptionOTT: These cookies are intended to make advertising more relevant to users and more valuable to advertisers. For example, we may use Cookies to serve you interest-based ads. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising, but you will still see ads.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _tt_enable_cookie
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is associated with TikTok which is used to collect data about behavior and purchases on the website and to measure the effect of advertising. It is also used to track website activity to help optimize advertising efforts.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _ttp
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is typically associated with the use of Taptap Digital, a company specializing in digital advertising. It is used for tracking and ad personalization purposes.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _uetsid
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is used by Bing to determine what ads should be shown that may be relevant to the end user perusing the site.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _te_
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie name is associated with the re-marketing services from Adroll.  It is generally set as a first party cookie.  Re-marketing is the practise of displaying online advertising targeted to users who have already visited the advertisers site, to encourage them to return.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _scid
FirstPartyCookies.description: Cookie associated with Snapchat. Sets a unique ID for the visitor, that allows third party advertisers to target the visitor with relevant advertisement. This pairing service is provided by third party advertisement hubs, which facilitates realtime bidding for advertisers.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _gcl_aw
FirstPartyCookies.description: Used by Google AdWords for experimenting with advertisement efficiency across websites using their services For more information about Google's processing of your personal data, please consult Google's Privacy & Terms site.Used to attribute commission to affiliates when you arrive at the website from an affiliate referral link. It is set when you click on one of our links and used to let the advertiser and us know the website from which you came.
FirstPartyCookies.thirdPartyDescription: Used to attribute commission to affiliates when you arrive at the website from an affiliate referral link. It is set when you click on one of our links and used to let the advertiser and us know the website from which you came.

FirstPartyCookies.Name: sp
FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is associated with Eventbrite and is used to deliver content tailored to the end user's interests and improve content creation. This cookie is also used for event-booking purposes.

FirstPartyCookies.description: This cookie is part of Google Analytics and is used to limit requests (throttle request rate).Google Analytics

FirstPartyCookies.Name: _sctr

FirstPartyCookies.description: Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real time bidding from third party advertisers

FirstPartyCookies.Name: __adroll_fpc

Cookies.Name: __Secure-xxxxxxx
Cookies.description: YouTube is a Google owned platform for hosting and sharing videos. Cookies.Name: li_gc
Cookies.description: This domain is owned by LinkedIn, the business networking platform. It typically acts as a third party host where website owners have placed one of its content sharing buttons in their pages, although its content and services can be embedded in other ways. Although such buttons add functionality to the website they are on, cookies are set regardless of whether or not the visitor has an active LinkedIn profile, or agreed to their terms and conditions.  For this reason it is classified as a primarily tracking/targeting domain.

Cookies.Name: KRTBCOOKIE_XXXX
Cookies.description: This cookie is used to correlate IDs with those of Pubmatic partners (such as demand side platform clients or other advertising technology companies). Pubmatic passes information stored by the partner in this cookie to the partner when it is considering whether to purchase advertisements. This enables the partner to make better decisions about whether to display an advertisement to you.

Groups.GroupDescription: These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit. If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.
